message_1: How many pairs of twin primes are there between 1 and 100?
message_2:
A twin prime pair consists of two prime numbers that have a difference of 2. Between 1 and 100, there are the following twin prime pairs:

(3, 5), (5, 7), (11, 13), (17, 19), (29, 31), (41, 43), (59, 61), (71, 73)

There are 8 pairs of twin primes between 1 and 100.
